translations: 防范；预防措施；预警（precaution 的复数）

phrs.translation: 未雨绸缪；采取预防措施

sentences.sentence: It is clearly prudent to take all precautions.
sentences.translation: 采取一切防范措施显然是慎重的。

sentences.sentence: We didn't take any precautions and I got pregnant.
sentences.translation: 我们没有采取任何避孕措施，所以我怀孕了。

sentences.sentence: You must take all reasonable precautions to protect yourself and your family.
sentences.translation: 你必须采取一切合理的预防措施，保护自己和家人。
